questionWording.description: Human-readable question aimed at a wizard user.
questionWording.example: Does this file contain nucleotides or proteins?

options.description: Array of possible answers the user can choose from.

defaultAnswer.example: answerID of one of the questions above

description.example: Will populate empty fields for Organism, e.g. name (Based on NCBI taxon ID)
